website_summaries.verdict: For geckos and other small reptiles, this insect-forward blend is an ideal snack.
pros: Emphasis on insect protein is appealing to most geckos
Amino acid profile ideal for small reptiles
Combination of freeze-dried fruits and organic insects
cons: Some individual ingredients, particularly fruit, may not appeal to all reptiles

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: So apparently I have a picky Gecko. I thought at first mixed with a different flavor was a hit. Nope, it’s actually literally just this food as my little one went on hunger strike. Put this in alone and immediately ate it! Purchased another small bag just in case and will be buying a larger bag next time. Not a hit used alone but ok mixed with Banana Apricot. It’s got a lower fat content in it so I’m using more of the other flavor to help with weight gain.
customer_reviews.author: amberpom

customer_reviews.title: 6 STARS all LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I have read & watch videos of Crested Gecko owners say their crestie will eat mix with insects, but don't really like it. My 7mo. crestie, 6mo. crestie, & my 6mo. gargoyle, can't get get enough of it! The 7 mo. old licks the dish clean even adding more than the last meal. I've tried most flavors, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Passport

customer_reviews.title: Crested gecko loves it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product that my crested gecko will actually eat. I've had her for about a year now and with everything I've tried giving her, she'd only eat once a week. With Pangea fruit mix with insects, my gecko is on the food within a couple of minutes and doesn't move until it's gone. I highly recommend this product and will be buying more and different varieties as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: BEST Crested gecko food out there!
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko would ONLY eat Repashy until I found this, and I couldn't get him to eat anything else (ZooMed and a couple of others). Even tried mixing bee pollen powder with the other foods to make it "sweeter" and more enticing to the gecko (per local breeder's recommendation). No go. THEN found this stuff, and he LOVES it. After talking to a couple of other breeders, I found out that this is ALL they use. I guess Repashy and some others have started causing infertility and impaction to gecks recently. After using this for a few months, he looks healthier and seems to be more energetic. This is all I use now (have found a local supplier)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Gile

customer_reviews.title: he rejected repashy super foods, watermelon and bana pangea
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko is such a picky eater , he rejected repashy super foods , watermelon and bana pangea , crickets worms and everyting . The second i placed this fruit mix she instantly went right to feed on it. Amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Legit seller
customer_reviews.text: It’s so hard now days to order something from Amazon and be sure you’re getting the product you ordered and not something someone is advertising as the real product but tampers with it. I have ordered from Pangea several times and get the product I ordered non tampered with every time. This is a legit seller! The geckos love it. It’s a little pricey for such a little bag but it lasts about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: B Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Typical High Quality Pangea Product
customer_reviews.text: Pangea NEVER disappoints. Very high quality meal replacement food for geckos. Love the packaging also. Easier to store than the food in plastic bottles. You will NEVER go wrong using a Pangea product to feed your animals.
customer_reviews.author: MaineFlyersFan

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko LOVES this. I bought the Pangea papaya flavor and he didn't like it. Feeding on Mango Superblend Repashy and this as his main, sometimes with a little Banana Cream Pie Repashy. I didn't expect such a big reaction. Now he waits on the front glass while I make his food instead of in the leaves. Licks it immediately and always finishes the whole cup. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't get this flavor, maybe try another.
customer_reviews.text: Gecko refused to eat it :/ waste of money for me in the long run since it just got thrown away. It also became like a thick jello if it sat for any period of time, and when you have a young gecker, it was too thick for her more then not, so I had to let it set, add water, let it set, add more water, then it was thin enough she could attempt to eat it (Which she didn't more then like, 2 licks if that before she realised she didn't like it)
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Gecko loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson’s gecko loves this food! But... I don’t know what I was thinking when I ordered the 2 oz. size. Won’t last long. Buy the larger bags and you will save money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lizard loves this food.
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my crested gecko the repashy diet and wanted to try something else in case he was getting sick of eating the same thing all of the time. He seemed to really like this diet and I will likely try the other varieties as well.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Mathis

customer_reviews.title: My Gecko Enjoys This
customer_reviews.text: My Crested Gecko has been eating this since I acquired her as a baby. She’s grown well and seems to enjoy the flavor. It mixes easily with water to make a smooth consistency. One bag lasts my Gecko a few months. Good value and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: My Crested Gecko was a picky eater but she adores ...
customer_reviews.text: My Crested Gecko was a picky eater but she adores both flavors of Pangea we have tried. She is so excited to eat that she bites the spoon containing the lizard smoothie. We only occasionally buy her dusted crickets as a treat (which she is not even truly interested in). This is her entire diet and she appears to be thriving.
customer_reviews.author: neecie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect complete diet. I do have to mix it with the Zoo Med Crested Gecko diet as it has a stronger, fruitier smell (Cresties are all about smell). Unfortunately Pangea is pretty expensive, you can get the same complete diet in the Zoo Med for a lot cheaper. I just like to mix these two to be extra sure he’s getting all the necessary vitamins and nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Ingram

customer_reviews.title: OUR GECKO LOVES PANGEA!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a crested gecko about a year ago and tried 3 different pangea flavors. This is by far his favorite! He finishes his bowl every time.
customer_reviews.author: Bertskiii

customer_reviews.title: It's the only stuff she'll eat
customer_reviews.text: This food is just about the only one our crestie will eat- even other flavors from the same brand often just sit. But she seems to love this stuff. I have to keep ordering it- I can't find it anywhere else! and the little bag makes a lot of food!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: works for a hedgehog too
customer_reviews.text: even though this is for a geek I have a hedgehog and he loves it just as well. But the size was really small we ended up getting the bigger size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Feeder Frenzy
customer_reviews.text: I had my gecko on the banana-apricot diet and she was just barely eating that, but would go crazy over any feeders so I figured I'd give it a shot. I have never seen her eat so much, let alone in one sitting. She's putting on weight again and hitting the growth spurts she should be. I could not be more thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great food!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the new mix with insects - my crested gecko goes wild over it. He eats much more food and seems healthier for it. I feed it to him 5 times a week and he always polished off a full Aquafina cap full, with the other he would just pick at it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Finney

customer_reviews.title: Healthy diet made easy
customer_reviews.text: I am new to Crested Geckos. But the ones I did get, a 6 year old retired breeder that has been on Pangea Fruit Mix With Insects since it came out and a couple of juveniles that were fed this diet since hatching. They like it very much and eat it well. They have a healthy appearance. I like the fact it's a complete diet and they get everything they need from it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B

customer_reviews.title: I guess it's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Our gecko mainly eats crickets, but I purchased this to see if he would like it. One time he wouldn't touch it, another time he ate almost all I gave him. I'm still not sure the proper consistency that geckos like, so maybe I'm making it differently, but I will keep offering it to him. It smells good at least.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Busch

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really wish for the price that there was more to this bag and that it lasted a little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: His favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko adores this flavor! I think the insects really entice him to eat it. It’s smell isn’t that bad either so that’s a plus! Very easy to make as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne M.

customer_reviews.title: Gecko eats nothing else
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my crested gecko this food for 3 years since he was a baby and he's never eaten any thing else, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: John Iseli

customer_reviews.title: All my animals love Pangea
customer_reviews.text: You guys won’t believe this. I received my package about 1 hour ago; but this is the third bag of Pangea that I have bought in one month! I thought I was crazy, I lost 2 big bags. Turns out, my dogs like to eat it. So I’ve spent about $60 on what should be nearly a half a years worth supply of Gecko food and now I still can’t feed my Crestie. LOL. Overall great product otherwise 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised on how small the package was. Perhaps, I should’ve read the ounces first. However, my cresti loves this mix . It’s her favorite and it usually gets eaten entirely. I will continue to buy this brand and probably try out some other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Julieanne Mills

customer_reviews.title: Picky Gecko
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a very picky crested gecko for the last year and a half. I have tried various other mixes(other Pangea mixes and Repashy,) but he's only ever eaten the bare minimum. Live insects are the only thing he eats without any hesitation, so I thought I'd give this a go. When he tasted it the first time, he got the same crazy look in his eyes as when he sees a creepy crawly and lunged at the little cup of food I had mixed up for him. Dum dum. Now it's not uncommon for me to find empty food bowls in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Yoshi seems to really like it, and it's doing its job of putting ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first food I am trying out with my new Crested Gecko Yoshi. I watched many reviews on this. Yoshi seems to really like it, and it's doing its job of putting on a steady weight for the juvenile. Plus it has insect in there as well which is helpful if you're unable to get crickets of worms less often as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Rejected
customer_reviews.text: My Gargoyle Gecko, who has eaten pangaea gecko food all his life, wouldn't go near it. Not even when I tried to bribe him with some fresh fruit mixed in. Guess I'll try a different flavor. He loves watermelon mango, and banana apricot.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Same stuff better price
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than other places. Same great product. My creatives liked it
customer_reviews.author: Meggstahh

customer_reviews.title: Gecko loves it
customer_reviews.text: My gecko seems to gobble this up every time I put it in his tank! No complaints and I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: great flavor option
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky crested that only liked ONE flavor until we tried this one, so at least we can rotate between two and he seems happy.
customer_reviews.author: mrs doe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended this by the company I bought my crested gecko from, during the Daytona Repticon Reptile Expo. My crested eats nothing but this brand and flavor. She refuses to eat any other powder diets. Lasts quite a while. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko likes it and I got the exact product I ordered. Couldn’t of been better unless I got extra stuff LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jaymo

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to live insects
customer_reviews.text: My day gecko really likes the Pangea Fruit Mix with Insects, but he's not a picky eater. I have bought him a couple of Pangea Fruit Mix varieties and so far he likes them all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen2224

customer_reviews.title: Smells good enough to eat
customer_reviews.text: My lizards love this stuff. You mix it with hot water. It becomes like baby food, smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good food for Crested Geckos
customer_reviews.text: My Crested Gecko seems to prefer this food over other brands. I should add that the people at Pangea are always very helpful if you have any questions. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We got our gecko from a friend who just had him on the basic crested gecko food from PetSmart, and since he has been on this Pangaea food, which was back in September, he has been way more active and he just looks healthier! He very rarely let's his food go to waste now. Seriously, will never buy a different brand of crested food!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: My gecko did not care for this flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Our gecko enjoys eating live crickets, but didn’t like this food so much. Mixing 40/60 with banana/apricot flavor and he likes better.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Tada

customer_reviews.title: TIKI LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko, Tiki, likes it so I give it 5 stars. If Tiki likes it, I like it. Lol. Easy to make and very simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: ReptileChick31

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My gecko loves this food and is happy and healthy. Pangea makes a good quality product. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Crested gecko babies approve
customer_reviews.text: My little cresties like this flavor in particular. The insects in it look like pepper flakes, so it doesn't look gross and it smells like bananas.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As I am new to breeding crestie, I decided to try the most popular crestie food in the market. My 6g crestie doesn't eat it much, only about 1/5 of teaspoon every other day. But I have heard it is normal for a baby crestie, so overall satisfied with purchasing the right item.
customer_reviews.author: Yooji Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loved By Picky Geckos
customer_reviews.text: My crested geckos love this food! They've been on the Repashy original formula for months and they honestly seem to like this a lot better. 4/5 geckos clean their bowls every time this food is available to them. I would definitely recommend this flavor!
customer_reviews.author: geckomom

customer_reviews.title: Great gecko food
customer_reviews.text: Needed this brand for my gecko and he actually eats it
customer_reviews.author: Diamonte Dane

customer_reviews.title: Great! My crestie loves this blend
customer_reviews.text: Great! My crestie loves this blend. It is easy to clean up too because after it is fully dried, it easily slides / chips off of the bowl surface. It smells like protein powder haha
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Geckos are Picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: Crested Gecko did not approve. Mine approved of the Banana flavor more.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Ventola

customer_reviews.title: This is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby gecko LOVES her Pangea!! I have been giving her this flavor for almost three months now (the small package lasts her 2-3 months!) and she loves it! She’s happier, getting bigger and it’s amazing! Once she’s older and doesn’t need insects in her diet, I’ll be switching flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Mayhugh

customer_reviews.title: I switched over from mango flavor of this brand to ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched over from mango flavor of this brand to this one, and my created gecko went nuts. He loves this one!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Teel

customer_reviews.title: Larry loves this
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko, Larry, loves this. I have made it fresh nightly for him for the past three years. He wasn’t interested in watermelon flavor but really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Plananimish

customer_reviews.title: My Crested Geckos love this food
customer_reviews.text: My Crested Geckos love this food. I've tried different foods but they love Pangea, I highly recommend Pangea food to any crested gecko owner!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 gecko boners
customer_reviews.text: If my gecko is able to dream I'm sure he has wet dreams about this food. He usually likes the watermelon one but the insects really gives it that extra umami that drives my little guy insane.
customer_reviews.author: elsy diaz

customer_reviews.title: If you love your gecko, this is the product to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product- my created gecko will not eat anything else....and I have tried just out of convenience. The product is fresh and well worth the its weight in gold!
customer_reviews.author: Csecapps

customer_reviews.title: Great for young geckos!
customer_reviews.text: Gecko has been eating a lot more now that I started feeding her this. She loves it. Super glad I decided to try this brand!
customer_reviews.author: K@stin3

customer_reviews.title: Received opened product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars I would. I have no complaints about the product itself. Our created gecko lives this good. BUT- if a product is returned with huge cut in the top that goes through the seal it should NOT be resold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gecko won't eat
customer_reviews.text: I had to change to other flavor. He doesn't like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Momma

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent Product. My crested Geckos love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent Product. My crested Geckos love this stuff, its all I feed. It has everything your little one needs!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Geckos love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing my garg will eat. I personally wouldn't, but he's happy, and that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Psy

customer_reviews.title: High quality gecko diet
customer_reviews.text: A nice quality gecko food, my cousin's crested eats it regularly with another pangea flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Blue's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crested gecko food
customer_reviews.text: My juvenile crested gecko, Rexy, loves this food even more than their other one (papaya flavor)! I put some of this on my finger and Rexy lunges right onto my finger and starts chowing down!
customer_reviews.author: Birb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little crestie loves this one tried others and he didn't care for them as much .
customer_reviews.author: webb

customer_reviews.title: It must taste good! My gecko loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My Gecko will only eat this food. He’s picky as hell 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for crested gecko
customer_reviews.text: My crestie LOVES this mix. It's his favorite. Highly recommend this and mixing up the diet with other Pangea mixes and live crickets occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall R. Genier

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Always a pleasure doing business with Pangea. Fast shipping, great product. My cresteds love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but good
customer_reviews.text: It stinks to the high heavens but the gecko likes it so
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality
customer_reviews.text: Darkfire loves this stuff. Decent amount for a good price. My crestey just gobbles it up. The added bugs make it good too.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: My girl Danny loves this! Luckily she doesn't eat too much, so the bag lasts a while
customer_reviews.author: ricki lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for cresteds mine love it even my tokay love this stuff but I wouldn't feed them it to often I switch it around with the repeshy
customer_reviews.author: Jen Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Happy gecko
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Lenni the crested gecko seems to like the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: DennisB

customer_reviews.title: Love Pangea!
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko Ichabod loves Pangea food. Especially this one with tiny insects in it. He's growing nice and big.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My gecko is a picky eater but he loved this fruit mix!
customer_reviews.author: A. Witmer

customer_reviews.title: Crestie in Love
customer_reviews.text: This has been recommended to me by someone who has experience with geckos. This is a very nutritious formula, and my gecko loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: My crested loves all Pangea mixes and this flavor is no exception! Mixes well and keeps for a few days in the fridge if you make a batch a head of time.

customer_reviews.title: Jo
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. Shipping fast and without problems

customer_reviews.title: My little crestie Atlas loves this stuff I want to ...

customer_reviews.author: Y.S.

customer_reviews.title: Insects and Fruit in one...one stop on noms for Fruit-eating gecks.
customer_reviews.text: My cresteds love it! From the momma to the tiny baby...they all eat it. Thank you for a great product, Pangea.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only created gecko diet my animal will eat. Until I found this product, she would only eat insects. If you gecko won't eat, give this product a try. I'm really happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: Our crested Gekco is a picky eater and loves this!

customer_reviews.text: Our crested gecko eats this food and is still alive after a year so I guess its good.

customer_reviews.title: The only flavor my crestie refuses to turn down
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko loves it. It's his favorite of them all.

customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko stopped eating his repashy, so i switched to pangea. He LOVES this flavor. I'd highly recommend to anyone who has a picky gecko.

customer_reviews.text: My Crested gecko's love it. I wish it was less expensive.

customer_reviews.text: My Gecko Loved this! He immediately went up to his feeding cup and scarfed it up! Thumbs up Pangea keep doing big thangs!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both my gargoyle and my crested gecko LOVE this food.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko, Smèagol, hasn't been eating his food. I would make it for him and he would never touch it. I ordered this food for him and as soon as I put it in his bowl he went crazy. My boyfriend put some on his finger and Smèagol was eating it off there! I ordered this food because of all the reviews I saw, but I was still doubtful... But now that I've seen how crazy my gecko is about it I'm amazed. Everyone needs to get this food because it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I use this as the main staple diet for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as the main staple diet for my Gargoyle Gecko. He eats it, though he usually does it when I'm not there, but I see the mess he makes after eating!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: When I got my crested gecko I had a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got my crested gecko I had a hard time getting him to eat. I looked the reviews and decided to give it a try. He loves it. I pigged out on the first batch I made him. I tried the apricot one as well and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My crested gecko was not fond of his old food ...
customer_reviews.text: My crested gecko was not fond of his old food but LOVES this one! He's actually finishing all of his food!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a good product, Pangea is great food! Neither of my two Geckos will touch this stuff, though. However, it doesn't look like anyone else is having this issue. Mine are just oddballs lol
customer_reviews.author: ILuvRemus

product_meta.title: Pangea Fruit Mix with Insects Crested Gecko Complete Diet 2 oz
feature_bullets: Formulated with Insects as one of the main ingredients.
5 years of development and testing on one of the largest gecko collections in the U.S.
All Natural Fruits are used as the base of this diet.
Nutritious and delicious food for crested geckos, and all fruit eating geckos. Simply mix with water and feed.
